summary: Malkavs retexture of the whole Elven Armor and Weapon set.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/567/titledarkelven2.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://img194.imageshack.us/img194/1061/darkelvenset.png[/img][/center]
 
[img]http://img545.imageshack.us/img545/5342/description3.png [/img]
This is my Elven set retexture. I didnt like that the Elven Armor and weapons looked so much like Dwarven and Glass so Ive made my textures to change that.
This mod will replace all Elven weapons and all armor, including arrows, Moonstone ingot and ore. Female version included too.

The textures are 2048x2048 pixels. They are not made from scratch, but rather overlayed with my own textures and adjusted for better effect. I didnâ€™t aim for HD textures, rather something different, that  would stand out but still was lore friendly.

[img]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/4646/instalation.png[/img]
Unzip the files to your Skyrim game folder.


If you like this, please dont forget to [color=red]ENDORSE[/color].

[img]http://img546.imageshack.us/img546/3817/othermods.png[/img]
